name: River Raid Halloween
description:
River Raid is back with new graphics and much more fun.

================ NEW ENEMIES
Ghost which will follow you!
Witches which will move very fast.
Bats that will change direction continuously.
Pumpkins that are FUEL thanks or angry Enemies.

====== River Raid Halloween Futures =====
* New Enemies
* New Enemy behaviors
* New Graphics
* New Music And Sounds Effects
* Challenging & Action Game play
* Easy to learn

*********************
All level is original and in this River Raid you have to
take car :Ghost ,Witches ,Bats ,Pumpkins, that's all enemy at Halloween night.
